job.title: Software Programmer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: ARC Group is currently looking for a Senior Software Developer with experience in Full-Stack & Cloud. This opportunity is with a client of ours that has impressive growth in the Digital Media industry. The department location for this opportunity is in New York City & Boston, MA but you can be located at your home office as this role is 100% Remote.  Our client offers excellent benefits, a competitive salary, and a good work-life balance. This role is 100% remote even after the pandemic is over. This is a direct-hire (permanent hire): Being so, candidates must be eligible to work for any employer without sponsorship now or in the future. No third parties. : Powered by JazzHR  3hPQiyNl7n
